the words up and down are seen as
opposites in its most common form

the word up means to move from a low
place

to a high one when something moves
up it goes from a low point to a higher

one
it can be an adjective an adverb or a

preposition
as an adverb the music could be heard

up in my bedroom the dog
looked up at its owner

the word down is the opposite of up
movement from a high place to a low

place
is down you move down

position

is to go down just like up
